Revit to Unity AR

Revit to Unity with Apple AR Kit

Description

This Apple App uses Unity and Appleâ€™s AR Kit to see the Revit model in augmented reality (AR) using a printed logo on a floor plan or detail. The Apple app was then improved to scan objects and tie them to a Revit model. The App scans a 3D printed model of a high rise and then pulls the appropriate Revit model in AR.
